Sentence: The superconductivity of MgB 2 flowers was confirmed by a magnetization measurement, and the transition temperature is 39 K, which is comparable with high-quality bulk samples.
The onset superconducting transition of the MgB 2 flowers is â¼39 K.
As a plausible explanation for the growth mechanism of MgB 2 flowers, we have suggested the catalytic behavior of an amorphous boron layer.
